SEARCH
Package ch.hevs.isi.core

Class DataPoint

java.lang.Object
ch.hevs.isi.core.DataPoint
Direct Known Subclasses:
BooleanDataPoint, FloatDataPoint
public abstract class DataPoint extends Object
Abstract class representing a data point in the system.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected static Map<String,DataPoint>
    dataPointMap
    A map to store all DataPoints with their labels as keys.

    isOutput
    Indicates whether the DataPoint is an output or not.
